TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔː l s t ɪ l ɐ æ s k h ɜː t ʊ b ɹ ɪ ŋ d ɪ s t ɪ ŋ s w ɪ z h ɜː f ɹ ʌ m v ɪ s t ɔː s ɪ k s p ʊ n t s ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v t ɪ k s l eɪ b s ʌ f b l uː ʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n eɪ k f ɔːɹ h ɜː b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɔ b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k eɪ n d b ɪ b ɪ ɡ t oʊ f f ɹ ɔ ɡ ə f ɹ ʌ m v ɪ k ɪ t z f ɔː v ɪ k ɪ s ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p d ɪ s t ɪ ŋ k s n t ʊ t ɹ iː ɡ ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w iː ɪ l ə ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t v ɪ t ɹ aɪ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
